record.title: MOTION TO ADJOURN

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: ABERCROMBIE
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I move that the House do now adjourn.

record.chair: The question is on the motion to adjourn.

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: ABERCROMBIE
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I demand a recorded vote.

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mrs.
speaking-unknown-id.name: MYRICK
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I was unable to participate in the following vote. If I had been present, I would have voted as follows: Rollcall vote No. 781, on motion to adjourn, I would have voted "aye."

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: WELLER
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 781, I was stuck in an elevator with several other Members. Had I been present, I would have voted "no."

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: SESTAK
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Madam Speaker, on rollcall No. 781, had I been present, I would have voted "no."
